EmailTemplate.name: Product Delivered - Social Post_Client Website
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Five Star Professional social post with website has been published!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Fulfillment__c.Display_Contact_First_Name__c}:
A new social post has been published for you! Please check out your new post online and share it directly to your network to optimize the views and interactions.
Your post can be viewed here: {!Fulfillment__c.Product_Delivered_Link__c}
Additionally, we encourage you to share the following announcement email with your clients and network. Just copy/paste the content below into an email or other digital announcement platform to share.
If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to reach out to your Client Success Representative, {!Fulfillment__c.Fulfillment_Owner_Fullname__c}, at {!Fulfillment__c.Fulfillment_Owner_Phone__c} or by email at {!Fulfillment__c.Fulfillment_Owner_Email__c}.
Thank you, Five Star Professional Client Success Team
_________________________________
At Five Star Professional, we work hard to recognize outstanding professionals from across the country each year. One winner that I would like to call special attention to is {!Fulfillment__c.Display_Contact_First_Name__c} {!Fulfillment__c.Display_Contact_Last_Name__c}. {!Fulfillment__c.Display_Contact_First_Name__c} is a {!Fulfillment__c.Market_Award_Year__c} winner of our {!Fulfillment__c.Associated_With__c} award in {!Fulfillment__c.Market_Region__c}.
One attribute all of our {!Fulfillment__c.Associated_With__c} 's have in common is a dedication to service. {!Fulfillment__c.Display_Contact_First_Name__c}'s commitment to clients goes above and beyond the norm. For more information on {!Fulfillment__c.Display_Contact_First_Name__c}, check out the below social post by copying and pasting into your browser.
{!Fulfillment__c.Product_Delivered_Link__c}
Jonathan Wesser Five Star Professional VP, Research
